definition: hand-mixed drink (of the kind sold at a bubble tea shop)

sentences.english: Also eat some fruits, milk and a small amount of soft drinks containing carbonic acid gas.
sentences.chinese: 還可喫一些水果，牛奶以及少量含碳酸氣的飲料。

sentences.english: A Single Con Panna is a delicious coffee drink that's easy to make.
sentences.chinese: 一個單一濃度潘納是一種美味的咖啡飲料，很容易使。

sentences.english: You can use fun ice-cube shapes for drinks, too.
sentences.chinese: 同時，你也可以用些有趣的冰塊狀給飲料添加吸引力。

sentences.english: Can I get you your drink while you are making your selection?
sentences.chinese: 在您點餐的時候，我可以幫你拿杯飲料嗎？

sentences.english: Mainly dealing with camellia oil, tea drinks and tea powder and so on.
sentences.chinese: 主要生產山茶油，茶飲料和茶粉等產品。

sentences.english: Can I fix you a drink (or fix a drink for you)?
Drink fewer sodas and other sweetened drinks, like iced tea.
sentences.chinese: 少喝蘇打汽水和其他甜飲料，比如冰茶。

sentences.english: Food grade polished aluminium cubes to be frozen and used in drinks as ice cubes.
sentences.chinese: 用食用色素處理過的凍鋁塊放到飲料裏當冰塊。

sentences.english: The watery fluid in the central cavity of the coconut, used chiefly as a beverage.
sentences.chinese: 從椰子果肉中提取的奶狀液體，用於食物或作爲飲料。

sentences.english: In this paper, the preparation technology for Spirulina colour- pearled drink was studied.
sentences.chinese: 對螺旋藻珍珠粒飲料的製作技術進行了較深入地研究。

sentences.english: The Bartender's primary function involves serving alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages to guests of the Resort.
sentences.chinese: 吧員的主要職責是爲客人提供含酒精和不含酒精飲料。

sentences.english: Pecin can be used as a stabiliser in the acidified milk drinks.
sentences.chinese: 果膠可用於酸性乳飲料中作爲穩定劑。

sentences.english: Joe is thirsty.Pass him a drink.
sentences.chinese: 喬看起來很渴，請遞給他一杯飲料。

sentences.english: A defatted pine-nut milk drink was developed from pine-nut.
sentences.chinese: 以脫脂松籽爲原料，開發研製了松籽乳飲料。

sentences.english: No Food or Drink Allowed into Exhibtion Hall.
sentences.chinese: 請勿帶食物或飲料進展廳。

sentences.english: We serve many kinds of drinks. Please help yourself.
sentences.chinese: 我們供應很多種飲料，請自便。
